name: Hippos with Jetpacks
description:
Hippos with Jetpacks

You are Hippocrates, the world's most famous Hipponaut from the Hippo's Democratic Republic of Hippo. (Not to be confused with Hippocrates, the dead Greek guy with some weird doctor's oaf. I mean, oath.)

Fly about in a wildly uncontrollable jetpack as you demonstrate to other hippos how's it's done! But watch out for those nasty Mike Wazowski knock-offs, because they're evil. (No explanation as to why. Maybe hippos are racist. Oh dear.)

Anyways, fly about in your jetpack, kill nasty enemies with the flame, and try to make the most impressive landing!
